== Community ==
 * [http://hirlam.org/index.php/forum/index HIRLAM Forum]: discussion and help within the HIRLAM community.
 * [wiki:HirlamMeetings HIRLAM Meetings]: Working weeks and other HARMONIE-related meetings
 * [wiki:NwpInventory HIRLAM NWP]: Information on operational implementation of HIRLAM and HARMONIE
 * [wiki:Surface_physis_assimilation Surface physics and assimilation]: HIRLAM activities related to development in surface physics and assimilation
 * [https://hirlam.org/mailman/listinfo HIRLAM mailing lists]: subscribe to receive common interest e-mails 
 * [http://joomla.hirlam.org/index.php/communication/contact HIRLAM staff]: contact information on HIRLAM web site

 * [wiki:HarmonieClimate Harmonie Climate]: status, development and documentation of HARMONIE Climate (HCLIM), the climate version of HARMONIE
 * [wiki:HirlamChemicalBranch Hirlam Chemical Branch]: HIRLAM Chemical branch & Enviro-HIRLAM online integrated NWP-ACTM model

== Data ==
 * [wiki:dataportal HIRLAM Data Portal]: Monitoring and Inter-comparison of Operational and Real time Harmonie/HIRLAM/GLAMEPS
 * [wiki:OnDuty HIRLAM On-Duty task team]: HIRLAM-B instrument to carry through regular support, maintenance and monitoring duties on a rotating basis

== wiki access ==
Access policy: The Hirlam system wiki is open to the research and operational community within HIRLAM and ALADIN consortia. Please log-in using your Hirlam user-id and password for that purpose. If you do not currently have an user-id and password, please contact [mailto:dsantosm@aemet.es Daniel Santos], AEMET, to acquire one.
